DESCRIPTION_CONTRACT_INFORMATION.TITLE_CONTRACT: Award of ICT contract to Descisys for the supply of support and maintenance services for the COINS spending data system – Interim Agreement – Contract awarded to a Small & Medium Sized Enterprise (SME)
DESCRIPTION_CONTRACT_INFORMATION.SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION: Award of ICT contract to Descisys for the supply of support and maintenance services for the COINS spending data system – Interim Agreement – Contract awarded to a Small & Medium Sized Enterprise (SME)

LOCATION.p: Additional Information: Various sites across Great Britain

DESCRIPTION_AWARD_NOTICE_INFORMATION.SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION: The Central Office of Information (COI) is to introduce a pan-government framework to purchase and manage the delivery of press cuttings to central Government Departments and the wider Public Sector hereafter referred to as Public Bodies. COI estimates that by introducing a single supplier approach the Government can make significant savings on current spend by gaining the benefit of HM Government’s economy-of-scale and reducing unnecessary duplication. The proposed service will operate 364 days a year (Christmas Day being the only day that services are not required) and be accessible to all Public Bodies who choose to participate. This facility will operate via an online portal that will provide Public Bodies with easy access to relevant articles from the national, regional and weekend newspapers that are relevant to their requirements. A hard copy press cutting service will also be provided. The successful contractor will be expected to provide both services.

FD_CONTRACT_AWARD.REASON_FOR_REPLACEMENT_OR_RETRACTION: Following legal advice we are withdrawing this notice and will re-issue with a revised ITT.

DESCRIPTION_AWARD_NOTICE_INFORMATION.TITLE_CONTRACT: Provision of Service to Track, Measure and Report Greenhouse Gas Emissions (GHG) and Energy Efficiency
DESCRIPTION_AWARD_NOTICE_INFORMATION.SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION: The Cabinet Office intends to identify a service provider that can supply Central Government Departments and the wider public sector with a mechanism to measure and report the greehouse gas emissions and energy efficiency of its key suppliers.

DESCRIPTION_AWARD_NOTICE_INFORMATION.TITLE_CONTRACT: Civil Society Sector Grant Fund Administration - Transition Fund
DESCRIPTION_AWARD_NOTICE_INFORMATION.SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION: Transition Fund: short-term grants to allow civil society organisations to fully engage in the Big Society, by providing time to re-model, diversify funding streams, change their businesses and to continue providing frontline services.

NATURE_OF_PROCUREMENT.DESCRIPTION: Competition as part of an existing framework agreement

DESCRIPTION_AWARD_NOTICE_INFORMATION.TITLE_CONTRACT: Procurement of Premium Collection Agency Services in support of Government Small Business Loan Guaranatee Programmes for the period 2011- 2015
DESCRIPTION_AWARD_NOTICE_INFORMATION.SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION: Operate the core direct debit process and provide relevant information on collections made to Capital for Enterprise Ltd (CfEL). Follow up failed collections by providing a monthly report to affected Lenders. Bank a small number of cheque payments submitted by Lenders to make up failed collections. Assist CfEL in resolving any ad hoc queries raised by Lenders in connection with premium collections. Contribute to continuous improvement of the premium collection process.
